title: sleep-debt-tracker
description: Sleep-debt-tracker is a project built using TypeScript, JavaScript, CSS, and HTML to help users track and manage their sleep debt. This repository provides a simple and intuitive interface for logging sleep hours, calculating accumulated sleep debt, and visualizing sleep patterns to promote healthier sleep habits. Focusing on practical application of TypeScript within a web development context, this project aims to provide insights into sleep management and encourages better sleep hygiene.

title: resume
description: This repository hosts my online resume, built using LaTeX for the source document and converted to HTML for web deployment. It showcases my skills and experience in a clean and professional format and serves as a project demonstrating my typesetting and web presentation capabilities.

title: next-idea-board
description: Next Idea Board is a project built with TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript, designed as a visual and interactive tool for brainstorming and organizing ideas. This Kanban-style application allows users to create boards, add ideas as cards, and move them between columns to track progress and prioritize tasks, providing a flexible and collaborative environment for project management and idea generation.

title: devboard
description: DevBoard is a Next.js 14 project (using the pages router) built with TypeScript, React, and MUI, designed as a comprehensive personal developer dashboard. It leverages React Query for efficient data fetching and management, providing a clean and organized interface to track projects, resources, and other essential development-related information. This repository showcases modern web development practices with a focus on type safety and a component-driven architecture.

title: dynamic-event-calendar
description: Dynamic-event-calendar is a project showcasing a customizable and interactive event calendar built using JavaScript, CSS, and HTML. This repository provides a foundational structure for creating dynamic calendar interfaces, enabling users to easily display and manage events with potential for future enhancements and integrations.

title: iot-asset-tracking
description: iot-asset-tracking is a full-stack web application built with Next.js, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, and Supabase, designed to provide a user-friendly interface for monitoring and managing IoT-connected assets. This project leverages real-time data streaming and utilizes modern web development practices to create an efficient and scalable solution for asset tracking and management.

title: robofleet-dashboard
description: The robofleet-dashboard repository hosts a web-based interface, built with JavaScript, Python (likely for backend services), HTML, and CSS, designed as a project to visualize and interact with data from a Robofleet system. It likely allows users to monitor robot status, sensor data, and mission progress in real-time, providing a comprehensive overview of the robotic fleet's operations.

title: next-voting
description: Next-voting is a project exploring decentralized voting solutions using Next.js, TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript. This repository implements a user-friendly interface for creating and participating in polls, leveraging modern web development practices to ensure a smooth and secure voting experience. It serves as a practical exploration of blockchain technology and democratic participation within a web application.

title: finance-with-python
description: This repository contains a collection of Jupyter Notebooks and Python scripts focused on applying programming techniques to various finance-related projects. Explore implementations for financial analysis, portfolio optimization, algorithmic trading strategies, and other quantitative finance concepts using Python.  It serves as a practical resource for learning how to leverage Python for financial modeling and data analysis.

title: Map-Visualisation
description: Map-Visualisation is a project exploring interactive map visualizations built using HTML and Python. This repository focuses on creating dynamic and informative map-based presentations, potentially leveraging Python libraries for data processing and HTML for front-end display and user interaction. It serves as a learning ground for implementing mapping techniques and data visualization within a web-based environment.

title: jovian
description: Jovian is a CRUD application built with Flask, Python, PostgreSQL, HTML, CSS, and Shell scripting, designed as a project to demonstrate full-stack development skills. It provides a functional interface for creating, reading, updating, and deleting data, showcasing a practical application of Python and database interaction within a web environment.

title: ros-log-viewer
description: ros-log-viewer is a web-based tool developed using JavaScript, Python, HTML, CSS, and Shell scripting for visualizing and analyzing ROS (Robot Operating System) log files. This project provides a user-friendly interface to parse, filter, and display ROS log data, aiding developers in debugging and understanding their ROS-based applications. It focuses on making log analysis more accessible and efficient within the broader ROS ecosystem.

title: NextJs-Dashboard
description: NextJs-Dashboard is a project showcasing a modern, responsive admin dashboard built with Next.js, TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript. It demonstrates best practices for structuring a Next.js application, incorporating reusable UI components, and managing data within a dashboard environment. This project serves as a practical example for developers learning to build complex web applications with the Next.js framework.

title: raven-v2
description: Raven-v2 is a project exploring modern web development techniques using TypeScript and JavaScript. This repository serves as a playground for experimenting with various front-end architectures and UI patterns, aiming to build a performant and scalable application. Primarily focused on practical application and learning, Raven-v2 showcases best practices in JavaScript/TypeScript development and project structure.

title: atg-world
description: ATG-World is a web-based project built with TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. This repository showcases [mention the main feature/purpose of the project, e.g., "an interactive world map"], focusing on [mention the key topics, e.g., "data visualization and user experience"]. Explore the code to understand how these technologies are integrated to create [mention the overall goal, e.g., "a dynamic and engaging web application"].

title: genietalks
description: GenieTalks is a full-stack web application built with TypeScript, Vite.js, and Express.js that leverages the Gemini API for intelligent conversations. This project showcases a modern tech stack to create engaging and interactive experiences, demonstrating proficiency in TypeScript, CSS, JavaScript, HTML, and API integration.

title: fruit-seller
description: Fruit-seller is a fully-featured e-commerce platform built with Next.js 14, leveraging TypeScript for type safety and employing React Query for efficient data fetching. This project utilizes MUI for a polished user interface and showcases best practices for building scalable web applications with a focus on the Pages Router. This repository serves as a comprehensive example for developers looking to implement modern e-commerce solutions, explore Next.js features, and learn about effective state management.
